Licensing

Code License

The software license is defined in the repository LICENSE file.

Data Sources

Data downloaded from external APIs must comply with their respective provider terms.

BGS

The archive is built from the BGS World Mineral Statistics API. Users must cite the source when redistributing derived results.

Future Integration

When USGS integration is added, licensing conditions will be documented here.
